Author: Alright#0419
Content: maybe this is a stupid suggestion, but could we add an exception to ac_staked to allow the coinbase vout to be spent in the same block then have the daemon combine coinbase output and coins used to stake the block into single output?

Author: Alright#0419
Content: this would keep the wallet from becoming bloated after a week or two

Author: Alright#0419
Content: from a user perspective, they'd just need to create UTXOs and leave it. This can be handled by script like pos64staker, but maybe it's better to have it as default behavior in daemon

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: No you cant

Author: Alright#0419
Content: why?

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: Because the staking utxo has to be teh last tx in the block thats how it validates it

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: It would be unsafe to create the tx ins the daemon... Maybe where it detects it stked the last block, to reset ram staker, it could create this tx...  but I dont think that will be  any better than just useing extermal script
